user_question: What are the most unusual hotel amenities available in the world?
final_answer: Some of the most unusual hotel amenities include a personal penguin concierge at the Adélie Hotel in Antarctica, an underwater music concert at the Atlantis Hotel in Dubai, and a private submarine tour from the Poseidon Undersea Resort in Fiji.
